jcr:content.jcr:title: Union of Democrats of Côte d'Ivoire

contentheadline.headline: Union of Democrats of Côte d'Ivoire

contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} The '''Union of Democrats of Côte d'Ivoire''' ({{Lang-fr|Union des Démocrates de Côte d'Ivoire}}) is a [[political party]] in [[Côte d'Ivoire]]. In the [[Ivorian parliamentary election, 2000–2001|parliamentary election]] held on 10 December 2000 and 14 January 2001, the party won 1 out of 225 seats. {{Ivorian political parties}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Union Of Democrats Of Cote D'ivoire}} [[Category:Political parties in Ivory Coast]] {{Côted'Ivoire-party-stub}}
